name: 張正春
objective:
MS teams: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3aaL39-kmogJVsndvX4FWJ2672uGhfhBOq68kMHiu9_vc1%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=4d17f16b-9a33-4798-b98c-e40b2051f033&tenantId=dfb5e216-2b8a-4b32-b1cb-e786a1095218

學習 C 語言的用法，包括：變數、表示式、敘述、形態宣告、 控制結構、函式、陣列、指標、結構、檔案處理、及格式化輸出 / 輸入等用法，以作業及期末專題強化學習效果。
Learn C programming, including: usage of variable, expression, statement, type declaration, control structure, function, array, pointer, structure, file processing, and formatted I/O. In this course, assignments and term projects will be emphasized to strengthen the learning.
schedule:
Week1: 變數
Week2: 表示式
Week3: 敘述
Week4: 形態宣告
Week5: 控制結構
Week6: 函式
Week7: 陣列
Week8: 指標
Week9:  Midtern
Week10: 結構
Week11: 檔案處理
Week12: 格式化輸出
Week13: 格式化輸入
Week14: 期末專題
Week15: 期末專題
Week16: 期末專題
Week17: 期末專題
Week18: Final exam
